title: Carbonaceous particulate matter promotes the horizontal transfer of antibiotic resistance genes
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EM00547J, Paper
Xuexia Peng, Jiake Zhou, Zishu Lan, Rong Tan, Tianjiao Chen, Danyang Shi, Haibei Li, Zhongwei Yang, Shuqing Zhou, Min Jin, Jun-Wen Li, Dong Yang
There is growing concern about the transfer of antibiotic-resistant bacteria (ARB) and antibiotic resistance genes (ARGs) in airborne particulate matter. In this study, we investigated the effects of virous types...
